Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2011 04:57AM Dnye wrote: You can try Bio-oil...they even sell it at Costco now. I put it on my back and it faded from red to white in a few months. Not sure if that was just natural but putting something on it, made me feel like I was helping. Hoping to use it soon on my breast. Surgeon said to wait a few more weeks and not to put anything on yet.
